name: The Iron Curtain
description:
This game was developed by  Kamyar "noak" Karimi during the "Historically Accurate 3" game jam.

Special thanks goes to Parsa Afrooz for helping with game design and playtesting and also Helia for her infinite moral support. This little game is dedicated to you ! Without your help the game would not get finished.

Everything, apart from the assets mentioned in the credits list, has been developed and created by Kamyar Karimi during the game jam period.

------------------

Credits: 

Streets tileset by Baŝto : https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-streets

Main Menu music " We are friends forever" sung by Felix Dzerzhinsky Guards Regiment : Link

Acoustic guitar loop by Forgotten Dawn: https://forgottendawn.itch.io/royalty-free-legacy-music-pack

Wall sprite by GrumpyDiamond : https://opengameart.org/content/seamless-wall

Soviet program font by vladimirnikolic: https://www.creativefabrica.com/designer/vladimirnikolic/

Siren sound by Jwade722 : https://freesound.org/people/Jwade722/sounds/534550/

Gun shot sound by GregsMedia : https://freesound.org/people/GregsMedia/sounds/150137/
